lead_paragraph: The unfinished cycling arena is the biggest issue facing the Rio de Janeiro Olympics 100 days before the games begin, the city's mayor said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Unfinished Velodrome Is Main Concern 100 Days From Olympics
headline.main: Unfinished Velodrome Is Main Concern 100 Days From Olympics
